section.p: This class is used to store a reference to the health record that is the subject of the consent rules in the Consent Directive.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] recordId with data type Id
The id of the record that is the target of a consent directive.

Contains zero or one [0..1] recordLocation with data type String
The location of the record that is the target of a consent directive.

Contains exactly one [1..1] recordId with data type Id
The id of the record that is the target of a consent directive.

Contains zero or one [0..1] recordLocation with data type String
The location of the record that is the target of a consent directive.
